snippet: Efforts to find a lost masterpiece by Leonardo da Vinci behind a fresco by Giorgio Vasari in Florence's Palazzo Vecchio have shown possible signs of success, researchers in Italy say.
abstract: Efforts to find a lost masterpiece by Leonardo da Vinci behind a fresco by Giorgio Vasari in Florence's Palazzo Vecchio have shown possible signs of success, researchers in Italy say.

headline.main: Researchers May Have Found Evidence of Lost Leonardo Masterpiece
